Description:
Detects suspicious log entries in Linux log files

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Log Entries
Query: sourcetype="linux-*" ("entered promiscuous mode" OR "Deactivating service" OR "Oversized packet received from" OR "imuxsock begins to drop messages")
